spec_data.Name: colossus
spec_data.Description:
Colossus allows people to play Titan
(http://www.boardgamegeek.com/boardgame/103) and several Titan variants, hot
seat or via a network. Several different AIs are provided that can play instead
of humans.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Tue 01 Aug 2017 03:50:02 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Allows people to play Titan against each other or AIs
